name: 360 Flap
description:
Discover a 360° world full of blocks with :

  • Easy One touch control
  • 3 Different modes
  • Completely free
  • No Pop-up Ads
  • Play with your friends in Versus Mode
  • Google Play Games Achievements
  • Compete with your friends with Leader board for each mode
  • Optimized for a wide range of phones and tablets
  • Auto pause when no focus on game
  • and much more..
